I need to build an e-commerce platform with microservices architecture. I want separate services for users, products, orders, and payments. Use Kafka for event streaming between services. The frontend should be React and backend services should use Node.js with Express.

{
  "project": {
    "name": "ecommerce-platform",
    "author": "dev-team",
    "description": "Microservices e-commerce platform with event-driven architecture",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "status": "created",
    "metadata": {
      "tags": ["ecommerce", "microservices", "kafka"],
      "environment": "development"
    }
  },

    {
      "name": "node",
      "version": "18",
      "category": "runtime",
      "port": null,
      "environment_variables": null,
      "configuration": null,
      "enabled": true,
      "nix_package": "nodejs",
      "available_versions": ["16", "18", "20"]
    },
    {
      "name": "kafka",
      "version": "3.4",
      "category": "message_broker",
      "port": 9092,
      "environment_variables": {
        "KAFKA_BROKER": "localhost:9092"
      },
      "configuration": null,
      "enabled": true,
      "nix_package": "kafka",
      "available_versions": ["3.3", "3.4"]
    },
    {
      "name": "postgresql",
      "version": "15",
      "category": "database",
      "port": 5432,
      "environment_variables": null,
      "configuration": null,
      "enabled": true,
      "nix_package": "postgresql",
      "available_versions": ["14", "15", "16"]
    }
  ],
  "components": [
    {
      "component_id": "user-service",
      "type": "api",
      "name": "User Management Service",
      "technology": "node",
      "framework": "express",
      "port": 3001,
      "environment_variables": {
        "DB_HOST": "localhost",
        "DB_PORT": "5432"
      },
      "dependencies": ["user-db"],
      "status": "running",
      "directory": "services/user"
    },
    {
      "component_id": "product-service",
      "type": "api",
      "name": "Product Catalog Service",
      "technology": "node",
      "framework": "express",
      "port": 3002,
      "environment_variables": {
        "KAFKA_BROKER": "localhost:9092"
      },
      "dependencies": ["product-db"],
      "status": "running",
      "directory": "services/product"
    },
    {
      "component_id": "web-frontend",
      "type": "web",
      "name": "React Frontend",
      "technology": "node",
      "framework": "react",
      "port": 3000,
      "environment_variables": {},
      "dependencies": ["user-service", "product-service"],
      "status": "running",
      "directory": "frontend"
    },
    {
      "component_id": "user-db",
      "type": "database",
      "name": "User Database",
      "technology": "postgresql",
      "framework": "none",
      "port": 5432,
      "environment_variables": {},
      "dependencies": [],
      "status": "running",
      "directory": "databases/user"
    }
  ],
  "connections": [
    {
      "source": "web-frontend",
      "target": "user-service",
      "type": "api",
      "port": 3001
    },
    {
      "source": "web-frontend",
      "target": "product-service",
      "type": "api",
      "port": 3002
    },
    {
      "source": "user-service",
      "target": "user-db",
      "type": "database",
      "port": 5432
    },
    {
      "source": "product-service",
      "target": "kafka",
      "type": "message",
      "port": 9092
    }
  ]
}

    {

      "name": "RabbitMQ Message Broker",
      "technology": "rabbitmq",
      "framework": "none",
      "port": 5672,
      "environment_variables": {},
      "dependencies": [],
